channel.title: How can i accually code?
channel.description: Can someone accually teach me how to code the whole server..i dont really care if it will take months Tell me what to install Ive got rs2dv base...unless i need a different one Ive got jdk... I just need to learn to code the whole thing I can setup the server Could someone like show/teach me for free?? please or give me sites for tutorials

item.title: How can i accually code?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“wildskiller, post:15, topic:391990”]yes…but why take so long a runescape private server?
it is yet a remake of a customized runescape which are kind of fun to play but seem useless
so should it matter?[/quote]Ask me that question after you learn how to program.

item.title: How can i accually code?
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

ty love…your like awesome
i see you posting everywhere
seems you like to help?

how can people remember this??


Varek’s rs2d build file.




<target name="init">
	<!-- Create the time stamp -->
	<tstamp/>
</target>

<target name="compile" depends="init" description="compile the source">
	<mkdir dir="${build}"/>
	<!-- Compile the java code from ${src} into ${build} -->
	<javac srcdir="${src}" destdir="${build}" listfiles="true">
		<classpath>
			<fileset dir="lib" includes="**/*.jar"/>
		</classpath>
	</javac>
</target>

<target name="dist" depends="compile" description="generate the distribution" >
	<mkdir dir="${dist}"/>
	<jar jarfile="${dist}/rs2d.jar" basedir="${build}"/>
</target>

<target name="run" description="run the rs2d server">
	<java classname="${mainclass}" fork="true" maxmemory="200m">
		<jvmarg line="-Djava.nio.channels.spi.SelectorProvider=sun.nio.ch.EPollSelectorProvider -XX:+AggressiveOpts -XX:+UseParallelGC -XX:+UseBiasedLocking -XX:NewSize=64m"/>
		<classpath>
			<fileset dir="lib" includes="**/*.jar"/>
			<pathelement path="dist/rs2d.jar"/>
		</classpath>
	</java>
</target>

<target name="clean" description="clean up" >
	<!-- Delete the ${build} and ${dist} directory trees -->
	<delete dir="${build}"/>
	<delete dir="${dist}"/>
</target>

Read full topic

item.title: How can i accually code?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I like your valor of wanting to learn, but nobody will just “teach” you how to code an entire server. What I would suggest is sit down with a fairly original set base such as Project Insanity and learn the files and the contents.

Here are a few downloads I have on my mediafire you are more than welcome to use.

http://www.mediafire.com/?nsl5aldt0mjff2a

You could study as well java documents on the oracle website which can be found easily via www.google.com

Read full topic
